jobs.title: Games Tester
jobs.information: In this job, I was tasked quality testing products for clients. Typically these products were VR video games. These products would be tested throughout the week by a team, each member filling in part of a form on Jira and communicating through Microsoft Teams. This job taught me how to be organised and communicate effectively, having to fill out a checklist while cooperating with multiple others.

jobs.title: IT Service Work Placement
jobs.information: For over half of my year 13 in education, I was employed by MASS Consultants Ltd. This was one of my favourite jobs as it was very tech heavy and gave me insight into a day in the life of IT workers. In this job, I was tasked with taking on client requests (tickets) and working in a team or individually to solve them. Some of the jobs I was tasked with was building computer systems / setups, repairing / upgrading computer systems, and learning how to use the IT management system.

jobs.title: Customer Services Assistant
jobs.information: The next job I had was with the Co-operative. Here I was tasked with working the produce aisle. Each shift I would be tasked with reducing products that are near their expiry, then sort out the back and stock the shelves as needed.

jobs.title: Festive Colleague
jobs.information: For a large chunk of November through to December of 2020 I worked at Tesco as a festive worker. This job required me to be an effective team worker.
